summary: A collection of pytest test modules that verify the core backend components of the Chainlit framework, including context initialization, callback handling, event emission, server configuration, and user session management, using fixtures and mock objects to simulate HTTP and WebSocket interactions.
business_intent: Ensure the stability, correctness, and security of the backend services by automatically testing critical functionalities such as authentication, configuration loading, UI event dispatching, and session handling, thereby supporting reliable deployment of the application.
